publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5630♦ Sandra White: Threat to Glasgow Jobs—That the Parliament expresses its concern over the announcement by the Student Loans Company to cut 150 jobs in Glasgow and Hillington alongside the transfer of a further 45 jobs to its base in Darlington; believes that, at this time of economic uncertainty, everything that can be done to retain these jobs should be done; fully supports the Public and Commercial Services Union campaign against these cuts, and hopes that in the course of the consultation process wiser counsel will prevail.
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Elaine Smith*, Pauline McNeill*, Michael Matheson*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-5630# Sandra White: Threat to Glasgow Jobs—That the Parliament expresses its concern over the announcement by the Student Loans Company to cut 150 jobs in Glasgow and Hillington alongside the transfer of a further 45 jobs to its base in Darlington; believes that, at this time of economic uncertainty, everything that can be done to retain these jobs should be done; fully supports the Public and Commercial Services Union campaign against these cuts, and hopes that in the course of the consultation process wiser counsel will prevail. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Brian Adam, Elaine Smith, Pauline McNeill, Michael Matheson, Bob Doris, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd, Gil Paterson, Dave Thompson*
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Hugh Henry*, Trish Godman*
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Charlie Gordon*, John Scott*, Ross Finnie*, Des McNulty*, Ken Macintosh*, Stewart Maxwell*
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Duncan McNeil*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Irene Oldfather*
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Linda Fabiani*
S3M-5630# Threat to Glasgow Jobs (lodged on 27 January 2010) Robert Brown*
